verses.roman:
āpani śrī-kṛṣṇa yadi karena avatāra
āpane ācari' bhakti karena pracāra

synonyms: āpani—Himself; śrī-kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yadi—if; karena—He makes; avatāra—incarnation; āpane—Himself; ācari'-practicing; bhakti—devotional service; karena—does; pracāra—propagation.
translation: [Advaita Ācārya thought:] "If Śrī Kṛṣṇa were to appear as an incarnation, He Himself could preach devotion by His personal example.
